Blog.post: and did i mention that i no longer have to deal with my -6:20 on a friday night music complaining -complaining about smoke -"you park to close to my car" -"my mother's here" -"it's too hard to carry groceries up the stairs" shrek looking, balding, rhinocerous hooves, fat ass bitch that lived upstairs from mewith her waking me up by getting up out of bed, shaking my windows when she stomped around.... not to mention the "christians" who lived next door. grr
Goodbye Edgewater! Hello Old Irving! it looks like DeKalb over here. Lots of big houses and yards. I think it might even smell better!

To be said like an old russian man ..... "James..... you want I should.... help you with the keecking of the asses of those you call neighbors??" Hey... at least your movin on up (and the fuck out of there).

Check it out!!!!....My bitch ass upstairs neighbors called the cops on me again. Apparently I was too loud again. I went to sleep with my music playing, but it was too loud for there sensitive ears. Today is the day I move out of this building. In about 20 minutes or so, I'm going upstair sto have it out for the last time with the cop callin' bastard above. Both of the officers had been to my place the last time the bastard called the cops. This guys kids are loud as fuck all day long, from about 5am to 11pm, yet I don't call in the law. I'm not a bitch see. SO the cops were cool, one said "Last time I was here, there was a lot of pot smoke.". We all got a good laugh off that one. I had on my T-shirt that says "Hardcore," and the sweatshirt that says "Drunk.". What a combo for a police visit. One cop asked me to show the other my shirts. I got $35 disorderly conduct citation in the end. But for the most part, I had a good night.

The following things about last night "roxass": The Tamales, the eye patch, The Hunns!!!!!!!, the shopping cart Dan and I stole and rode all down Fullerton taking turns switching of "riding" and "driving" positions, The multiple shots of Jameson's I proceeded to have even after James had gone home, and last but most definitely the FLASH FUCKING TACO AT 3AM!

Yesterday was the first company softball game I was able to make, and we kicked ass! Now, I'm kinda sore from the game, but it was worth the win. Also today, Bevin took me to Second City. It was my first time goin' there, and it was great. I gotta go back to that place really soon. The actors were great, and the show was pretty damn funny at parts. The 3rd act of the show, was 100% improv, and pretty fuckin' funny too.

HAha. i love yahoo horoscopes: You've got to feel bad for anyone who dares to question your logic, because you'll definitely reduce them to a pile of simpering, whimpering apologies in a matter of moments.
Midnite BBQ roxass. Bevins roomate suxass. Softball team Kixass. Jane and Dovie are hardcore even though we didn't make Flash Taco. YOU OWE ME A FLASH TACO TRIP!
i've lived in this house for a little over two years. how is it that i've accumulated so much crap!
Huge Polka-Dotted Pain Balls!!! (a.k.a strep throat rules!)
paul as a v.o.r.! wow, what's this world coming to?

REGULATORS.................... MOUNT UP! Tonight's all about the rockin and the rollin! -- I've decided Paul will be the evening's VOR so since we are all free to be "ABI's" (another bad influence) (ok not sure how much sense that made) let the good times roll! HARDCORE!! (I'm really really procrastinating on cleaning.......... I'm gonna go see what is on channel 11)
James thats the best god damned idea EVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Why do I hate my liver so?

I'm gonna create a new cartoon. It just came to me. Peyote Coyote. He'll impart wisdom to all, and get in all sorts of doped up wacky adventures. Along with his sidekicks, Cocaine Cat, Smack the Rat, Mariquana, and L.S. Dog.

I think I'm now recovered from the infamous all day hangover. Gotta give the drinking a rest for a few days. Tuesday and Wednesday were a wild ride. I think I met Anne Murray, or something like that. I sat at a bar right next to a Jameson tap. You gotta love any bar that has good old fashioned Irish fightin' whiskey on tap. I had my camera but didn't take many pictures.
Right now I'm watching 100 Mexicanos Dijeron. This show kicks ass. Telemundo, and Galavision have all the good movies too. There's nothing like watching Goonies dubbed in Spanish.

james, that's what friends are for, i know you'd be there if i needed someone. besides like you've said a couple of times after a few drinks, i'm stuck with you for life. ha, hope you're having a better day today, watch out for those cars coming out of alleys.
Mr. Eddies Father Roxass!!! Today was a pretty fuvked up day, but that shit just made it a little better. Thanx again Dena. 394th CCT was hard fucking core!! Oh yeah..The Iris makes me smile. :-)

Speaking of "the courtship of Eddies Father", the new singer of the Dead Kennedys is Brandon Cruise (aka the little kid from the courtship...) and when I went to see them after the show everyone was coming up saying what an awesome job they did blah blah blah and my drunk ass kept shouting "Hey....remember when you were in "the courtshipt of Eddie's Father" ......... I know......... sungtines I'm just a little bit cooler than everyone else!

The theme song from the show "The Courtship of Eddies Father" was just going thru my head. I don't know why though. But, ppl let me tell you 'bout my best friend. And why Can't I find the theme to the Rockford Files anymore. That shit roxass. Jane, I know you got the Agnew, but don't be a stranger.

Have you ever had one of those days that you spend by your self not doing a whole lot just enjoying the relaxation and it isn't until you go to tell the man you just bought watermellon from, "thank you" that you realize you have not said one word the entire day and the very sound of your voice sounds weird and foreign and you decide there are some days things would just be better off not daying anything at all?.......... I just did
It's 4:20 right now. Guess what I'm doing.

Dena How was the boil w Dickie Duncan??? I'm pissed I didn't go but I think I needed some rest. I think I have the second coming of the bubonic plague. I woke up this morning and again had no voice, then proceeded to cough up not one or two but 8 large green items. I think I'm gonna walk on down to the beach with Angus and hope either a stray bus comes to put me out of my misery or the invigorating non salt water air mysteriously cures me.

I watched Kill Bill Vol. 1. It was pretty good. Vol 2. made alot more sense after that. I also Ate four tacos and pizza, and some liquor. I also called off work for the purpose of screwing over the lazy bitch that I work with. The hotel was at 100% today, and they could have really used me, but fuck 'em. Key thing...Don't piss me off.
i ate two lobsters today, what did you do?

hey uncle sal....... did you ever dance with the devil in the pale moonlight..... answer: "i dont know sungtines...... I dont give a shit" James is hardcore like a shaved peach ....... dena is sweet like the inside of a pixie stick ........ and im drunk like an ant floating in a beer

one of the loneliest sights is the last cigarette in the pack. damn leaving the house. damn putting on real clothes. damn travis for losing his job. damn no more $10 carton of smokes. damn damn damn boo
goddamn is it cold. brrrr. wish i would of shut the windows last night. l and l tonight, 9 pm. tv is so stupid, why am i watching this. why do i care if steve edwards gets a star. damn, i need a job!

Oh shit I forgot one (actually there's plenty more but that's neither here nor there) .... Call me fucking juvenile but anytime I hear someone say the work "poontang" I almost piss myself from laughing so hard... Ok I'm easily amused and I will never let my fourth grade sense of humor die...... Going to drink more cough syrup now -- James - sorry I "bailed" on you last week motto for tomorrow is "Jane shall not drink tequila before the sun goes down" -- I think that will fix things.

Ok there is an upside to being sick ..... That being, you can have the most insane thoughts and not think twice about it ..... So here are the random thoughts I'm having right now (watch out for the mucus).....Oranges are the best thing in the world......My dog barks too much...... Mayonnaise is sick and fucking gross...... Maybe I'm a guy trapped in a girls body ..... Maybe not ..... Then again maybe...... Ok no totally not cause then I'd have to be gay cause I like guys and I think girls are dumb......Peeing upright would be the shit though....... DAMN my dog is cute....... Who ever made bacon that has a shelf life of over 6 months w/out refrigeration is really fucking gross.........Wait a minute I think bacon all together is gross....... Why don't people wear the macaroni necklaces they made in grade school anymore..........Will someone please punch Walter Jacobson?.........Going to drink lots tomorrow...... Nothing new there.......................

James, i have kill bill vol 1 at my house, we rented it last night, it's probably not due back for a couple of days if you want to borrow it or come over and watch it. i'm doing laundry and cleaning the house today, so i'll be around. i'm supposed to go stoop sit with jenn tonight, hope it doesn't get to rainy. tomorrow night, it's l&l for dovie's welcome home party, just have to remember about not going to cesar's first, yikes, don't want to get that drunk again for a long time!

Today I ducked outta work early and went to the movies and saw Kill Bill Vol.2. I still have yet to the Kill Bill Vol.1. Anyway, the movie was pretty good, but Quetin Tar..whatever the fuck seems to be quite full of himself and it comes out in his movies. I still wanna see Vol.1. I mean, you can't watch Temple of Doom, and not see Raider of The Lost Ark Damnit!!! Whats Empire Strikes Back without Star Wars!?!? CRAP!!! Thats what! Anyway.... I later in the day went to the Sovereign. Bevin was bartending, Cali and Aaron were also there, and Jay was drunk as a circus monkey with a pistol. A little later Laurence showed up. It was kinda funny how there were only 4 regulars in the place at the time. Things have changed a lot there. Two Australians were in the bar also. They taught me the phrases: Dry as a Nuns nasty I'm so hungry I could eat the crouch of a low flying duck and I'm so hungry I could eat a horse and chase the jockey All and all, it was a good day.

yesterday i played jump robe with a little girl and her grandmother, neither one of them had many teeth but it made me smile! also, i got a voicemail yesterday thanking me for not hitting someone over the head with a bottle on saturday night, am i really that violent? no, stabbing inanimate objects like bars do not count.
Hardcore Pornography is the shit!
It's almost 4am, I'm high, and I'm listening to William Hungs cover of Hotel California. This shit is so fucking funny. You gotta hear it.
two pitchers of margaritas before going to the bar is NOT a good idea.

Turns out that me and Jill ened up being each others V.O.R for the night. Jane and Dena bailed on us. Sungtines is good to be theleast fucked up in the group. Also, I'll wear a white shirt if I damn well please! I love black but I'm not Johnny Cash. Wish I had a knife on me last night. It would have made some things a whole lot easier. But as usual, the pictures tell the story.
So, who is going to be the Voice of Reason tonight?
Woke up today with a slight hangover. This looks like a job for T.H.C.

I realized today that I'm alway angry. I've known it for a long time, but never really acknowledged it. I might be drunk right now, or I might be on to something. Wait......I know I'm drunk now. Well, hopefully tomorrow is gonna be a better day. I kow I didn't get into what happened today to piss me off, but it doesn't matter. Saturday I'm gonna hang out with Jane and her friend Spero, so know I'm gonna have fun. Spero I'm not sure if I met. (You know "sober half the time." or by Jane "!/4 of the time." But Jane roxass and thats all that counts.

So last night, after spending some quality time with my favorite dog, angus, and having a couple of glasses of wine with jane, ivan and i went to the beach with a bottle of wine, it was nice, the moon was full and it was a pretty clear night. we left when we saw the cops in a parking lot a little further down, when we got back to the car we were blocked in by an suv, i could see some movement in the driver's seat, this is also when we noticed the driver had his seat back and his hand above his head, when we started the car, a girls head popped up. nice, that's class right there, getting head at the beach, very nice, glad we saw it.
well, since it seems these days that I spend half the time sleeping... besides it's a lyric from one of the best country bands ever, Drag the River

Dena I appreciate the "sober half the time" comment -- but I think on behalf of you james and I it may need to be "sober 1/4th of the time" (note: so long as the first tuesday of the year does not fall below the average daily barometric pressure of the preceding saturday, in that case the sobriety factor would decrease to .2341 instead of the traditional .25)

Lets go white sox!! clap clap clap clap clap

Sweet, pbr and jameson! but you can never have just one...

Everyday Hollywood gives us exquisite sex and wholesome violence. That underscores our values. Every two child did. I will.
so what the hell was it that you guys were texting me last night?
Goin to Dekalb in a few minutes. Gonna go there with Jane and Jill. This should be interesting.

How to make a Piston Ingredients: 12 parts Jameson 5 parts Hard 5 parts Core Method: Combine in a shaker. Shake like hell and run!!! HARDCORE! You ever notice the ad's at the top of our blog are always for the Christian Alchohol Service. I think I need a drinking counselor. Wait a sec...I preside over the Drinking Council, which is in association with the Board of Intoxication.
How to make a dena bean Ingredients: 1 part friendliness 3 parts arrogance 1 part beauty Method: Layer ingredientes in a shot glass. Top it off with a sprinkle of caring and enjoy!

How to make a Crazy Fucking Jane Ingredients: 1 part success 3 parts courage 5 parts joy Method: Combine in a tall glass half filled with crushed ice. Serve with a slice of wisdom and a pinch of salt. Yum! Username: urlLink Personality cocktail From urlLink Go-Quiz.com just as good as Jameson's
i just made nachos in a george foreman grill. am i talented or what? wasn't even drunk either. ha!

Today I showed up for work late, but I kicked ass when I got there. Before I knew it, the day was over. Then it was time for Calico James (aka Redbull The Pirate) to go out and live it up. I sent a hail out to Jill, Jane, and Dena, and only Jane replied. So Jane and I went to Lyons Den to check out M.O.T.O. Only M.O.T.O roxass. The rest of the bands (except Manhandlers) sucked ass. I think Paul got kicked out for being a one man mosh pit. If you don't know Paul, then well.....fuck it...nevermind. In the end, me and Jane hit Flash Taco. (HARDCORE!!!) Then home was the destination. As Ice Cube Said, "Today was a good day.". Oh Yeah...Did I forget to mention Jane is fucking HARDCORE!!!!

-gay drill team -man on big wheel little wheel bike -very fat man in overalls yelling at ump in girls softball game -old man with penis hanging out of his pants no james, your neigborhood doesn't have any weird people in it

Good to have a day off. It's been a crazy week since last Wednesday, but at least I made it to Flash Taco. Hardcore!! Feels good to be outta Egdewater too. Me and Dena both turned that page in our lives at the same time. I might drop thru the Sov this Thursday, Joni brought me back a gift from Hawai'i that I need to pick up.
james + jane = really really really bad hangover right now

Yep! I think I need to slow it down a bit. Wayyyyy wayyyyy too much drinking latley and I got the bruises and shakes to prove it. TOnight me and Jill have a pajama date to the movies. Tomorrow is gonna be fun and nutty but after that its mellow time!

Oh no! Dr. Drinking was on call last night!! Huge bruise on my knee pinched nerve by my shoulder and strained vocal chords from really really really bad really really really loud singing. Oh well, had lots of fun and I think it got me out of the really bad mood I was in yesterday. Dena how did we get that drunk (cause dovie and I were at the staggering point) of just beer? No booze, shots or anything else? Just Beer!?!?!

No wonder I've been drinking so god damned much latley. It's some weird from of compensation to Dena's slow down. Ah well. Not much hangovers latley since I've been riding my bike all the time so that roxass!! Martini night tonight. Woo Hoo!!!!

So I've been checking out the Weatherbug for Colorado next week. It's calling for lows in the 30's and 40's every night next week. I've never been there in the summertime, quite a few times in the wintertime. In the winter it doesn't seem that cold because of the humidity (or lack therof) but still yikes, that's kind of chilly. I've been doing good with the slowing down of drinking, I took six whole days off and let my stomache heal. I've gone out a couple of times since than and think I might have this moderation thing down. I've decided that shots are my enemy! As I say this I just had a daydream of me and a shot glass in gorilla combat. ha!

tonight is my first night of going out while being on the wagon. I'm going to try to stay on for atleast a week. Vomitting blood is not fun. At all. If that's not a sign to slow down on the hooch, I don't know what is.

Ok, this is funny. I'm bored, it's friday night and all i'm doing is fucking around online. For some reason I decide to take an aptitude test, I just dropped out of school for design and this is what the response was: dena, your heart's desire is Design and the Arts You have a number of attributes that make you an excellent candidate for a design or artistic-related career. You understand how important it is to follow your heart, express your feelings, and do what you love, so it's likely you're already in a design-related field or have created a way to make your non-design-related job more artistic and expressive. If you're currently stuck in a job that does not allow you to throw your heart into your work, it's likely you're an unhappy soul and are not living your life's purpose. Until you get yourself back on track, the life you dream of may never arrive. how weird is that?
Softball seasons over. We played a good game, but now its over. Fuck It. Next Year we get the title.

WooHOo! Just got tickets to Colorado. I've never been to the Rockies in the summertime. Yay! Get to see the best big brother ever! Leaving the 2nd and coming back the 6th, kind of a short trip, but that's when Ivan can get off of work. So excited! i think that may be the most i've ever used exclamation points in my life!!!!!

Thanks to Jane and Jill for the party last night. I haven't played circle in years, also, turning catch phrase into a drinking game was a swell idea. Drinking nightly for almost a week is not a swell idea. Last night I had dreams of getting stuff done today, don't think that's going to happen. Maybe after the sun goes down, that might make it a little easier on me, urgh.

Woooo Hoooo!! I Love Pilsen and Pilsen loves me! No mas nort' side!! An and I are gonna create a web page for our taqueria reviews. There are sooo many we feel that is the only way to keep track of the good and the bad. I found the best little internet cafe where I am right now. Phone doesnt get turned on til the 19th (booo). Hope you had a great birthday Dena!! Tomorrow will be fun...... hey maybe if you come to Dekalb with me and James, today would be equally as fun :)

happy birthday to me happy birthday to me happy birthday dear me eee happy birthday to me is is my 25th year going to be as fun as everyone says it will? is there anything wrong with drinking wine by yourself in the afternoon, i think not.

So is there a B Plan for if it rains tomorrow? I might be a girl of many hats, but I don't have a sombrero, sorry Jane, how about a good ol cowboy hat?
